howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1Desc: Click the upload area or drag and drop to select a video file (WebM, MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, FLV)
howToUse.step2Desc: Select your desired output format (MP4 or WebM) from the dropdown and click the convert button
howToUse.step3Desc: Once conversion is complete, click the download button to save your converted file

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.a1: We support converting between multiple video formats including WebM, MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, and FLV. You can convert any of these formats to either MP4 or WebM.
faq.a2: Converted files are temporarily stored on the server and automatically deleted after 1 hour. After downloading, they are immediately saved to your browser's download folder.
faq.q3: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a3: Currently, there is no file size limit, but larger files may take longer to convert. For stable conversion, we recommend files under 100MB.
faq.a4: Yes, all files are securely processed and automatically deleted after 1 hour. Files are used only for conversion purposes and are not shared with third parties.
faq.a5: Yes, it's 100% free. No sign-up required, and there are no hidden costs. Feel free to use it anytime.
